divs: Sighting DetailsWHENT OUT ON THE PORCH TO SEE WHAT MY DOGS WERE BARKING AT AND NOTICE A VERY BRIGHT STAR.WHEN IT STAT TO MOVE UP TO WHERE IT WAS ABOVE TREE LEVEL TO WHERE I COULD SEE IT,IT ONLY TOOK 5 MINITES IT WAS HANGING ABOUT A MILE AWAY FROM MY LOCATION IN HOOSIRE NATIONAL FOREST.I WATCHED WITH BINOCULARS AND THE OBLECT SHOT OUT THREE SMALLER BALLS OF LIGHT THAT ARCHED AND FELL TOWARD THE GROUND THEN ABOUT TEN MINITS LATER SHOT TWO MORE BALLS OUT THAT DID THE SAME THING.THE WOLE TIM I OBSEVED THIS THE OBLECT WAS A VER BRIGHT WHITE TO THE NAKED EYE BUT THROUGH THE BINOCULARS HAD A HINT OF BLUE. I WATCED FOR A FEW MORE MINITES AND THE LIGHT DULLED AND I COULD SEE A DISC SHAPED OBJECT IT SLOWLY WENT STRAIT DOWN AS IF TO LAND.THERE IS A HUDGE OPEN AREA BACK WHERE IT WAS AT WHERE THERE ARE SOME OLD UNUSED OIL WELLS WANTED TO DRIVE OVER AND HIKE IN BUT RECOVERING FROM BACK SURGURY WOULDNT HAVE GOTTEN VERY FAR PLUSE I WAS KINDA CREEP OUT AND I THIK MY CURIOSITY MIGT HAVE GOT THE BEST OF ME.I SEE A LOT OF STANGE STUFF AND I GO THROUGH A SERIES OF TESTS BEFORE I CAN SAY WITHOUT A DOUBT UNEXPLANDED THIS WAS ONE I COULD NOT EXPLAIN AWAY.I TRIED TAKEING PICTURES OF THIS I HAVE SEEN IT BEFORE NOT FOR THIS DURATION WHEN I WENT TO TAKE THE PICTURES MY CAMRA WAS DEAD STRANGE THING WAS I TOOK THE BATTERY OFF THE CARGER AND IT WORKS FINE NOW AND BEFORE CANT EXPLAIN THAT.THE OTHER THING MY DOGS GOT VERY QUIET AFTER THE THINGS WERE SHOT OUT IN FACT IT WAS SO IN THE ARER IT WAS ERIR IT GAVE ME THE CREEPS AND I DONT SPOOK EASILY.
Summary: VERY BRIGHT STAR LIKE OBJECT TO BRIGHT TO BE STAR
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in HELTONVILLE
There were no other sightings in HELTONVILLE on or around December 11th 2011
